articles.author: James Gant
articles.title: Boris and Macron hold emergency 'peace talks' to end 'Battle of Jersey' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The world leaders (pictured, Boris Johnson with Carrie Symonds), who control Europe's two largest armies, will try to restore their 'brotherly' relationship amid the post-Brexit chaos.
articles.content:
Boris Johnson and Emmanuel Macron are set to hold emergency 'peace talks' to end the 'Battle of Jersey' after French fishermen threatened to blockade Calais.
The world leaders, who control Europe's … [+11617 chars]
